subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees scored four runs in the first inning of the rain-shortened game, two on a home run by Mark Teixeira, and starter Hiroki Kuroda went all seven innings for his ninth win.
snippet: The Yankees scored four runs in the first inning of the rain-shortened game, two on a home run by Mark Teixeira, and starter Hiroki Kuroda went all seven innings for his ninth win.
